title: Room in Kecamatan Kuta, Indonesia
description:
## About this space

Nice & Easy is our comfort of room, complete with a generously sized bathroom and bed, for your convenience. Plenty natural ventilation that fills the room with fresh air, along with a beautiful local hand made ceiling.

The Easy room, also known as Room 4, is the guarantee to a refreshing and stress free time in Bali. Enjoy out social area and pool at your door or take a short walk to the beach, only a minute walk away…
